name: Ismael Ayala-Uribe

discrepancies.ice_claim: Detainee was referred to local hospital day prior to death
discrepancies.counter_evidence: Ayala-Uribe was a former DACA recipient, raising questions about his detention circumstances

sources.title: DACA Recipient Dies in Adelanto Detention
Mexican National Dies in ICE Custody After Being Referred to Local Hospital Day Prior

notes: Former DACA recipient. 14th death in ICE custody in 2025 at time of death. Adelanto facility operated by GEO Group.
